articles.author: Chuck Culpepper
articles.title: Fernando Mendoza becomes Indiana’s first Heisman winner - The Washington Post
articles.description: The quarterback won the award Saturday night in New York over Vanderbilt quarterback Diego Pavia, Ohio State quarterback Julian Sayin and Notre Dame running back Jeremiyah Love.
articles.content: Perhaps the steepest ascent to the Heisman Trophy in all its 91 turns concluded Saturday night in New York, when the storied award went to Fernando Mendoza, the charismatic quarterback from Indiana, … [+233 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi’s India tour organizer detained after fans rip up seats, police say - CNN
articles.description: Lionel Messi’s tour of India kicked off chaotically on Saturday as fans threw objects, ripped up seats and invaded the pitch at Kolkata’s Salt Lake stadium after the Argentine soccer great made only a brief appearance at a ticketed event.
